link.title: Gazebo Simulation
link.description: Bring your robots to life in Gazebo Harmonic. Simulate physics, sensors, and environments for safe robot development before physical deployment.

learningObjectives: Set up Gazebo Harmonic with ROS 2 integration
Create simulation worlds with obstacles and terrain
Spawn URDF robots into Gazebo environments
Simulate sensors (cameras, LiDAR) and get data via ROS topics
Control robots in simulation via ROS 2
